医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
高中酗酒与中年危险饮酒有关对于数量惊人的中年人来说，高中聚会的日子从未真正结束。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Binge-drinking-in-high-school-linked-to-risky-drinking-in-midlife.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Binge-drinking-in-high-school-linked-to-risky-drinking-in-midlife.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05663c61-91ed-4ee3-b359-0d379e474064 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 14:17:40 -0400 Binge drinking in high school linked to risky drinking in midlife
机器学习揭示肺炎患者的不同临床状态两名正在接受肺炎治疗的患者可能看起来截然不同，并且结果相反。肺炎是一种因肺部充满液体的囊而导致呼吸困难的感染。然而，医生很难准确预测患者的预后并确定最有效的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Machine-learning-reveals-distinct-clinical-states-in-pneumonia-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Machine-learning-reveals-distinct-clinical-states-in-pneumonia-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d91a5250-947e-4245-a133-620185bc4d9a Tue, 29 Oct 2024 14:13:11 -0400 Machine learning reveals distinct clinical states in pneumonia patients
TAVR 早期干预被证明对无症状主动脉瓣狭窄是安全有效的第一个动力随机试验检查了对无症状、严重主动脉瓣狭窄 (AS) 患者进行经导管主动脉瓣置换术 (TAVR) 的早期干预，发现该策略是临床监测 (CS) 的安全有效的替代方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Early-intervention-with-TAVR-proves-safe-and- effective-for-asymptomatic-aortic-stenosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Early-intervention-with-TAVR-proves-safe-and- effective-for-asymptomatic-aortic-stenosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d1e14ea-a0bb-4015-bcf4-a43da803ed28 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 14:07:38 -0400 Early intervention with TAVR proves safe and effective for asymptomatic aortic stenosis
非洲生产MPOX疫苗可以确保非洲大陆的健康在非洲努力应对多发的麻疹疫情之际，公共卫生领导人表示，本地生产的疫苗对于结束对捐赠的依赖并确保非洲大陆的健康至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/African-product-of-mpox-vaccines-could-secure-the-Continente28099s-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/African-product-of-mpox-vaccines-could-secure-the-Continente28099s-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f980ae0f-6c25-4e2c-bc10-1e838e08d96c Tue, 29 Oct 2024 13:58:00 -0400 African production of mpox vaccines could secure the continent’s health
研究强调需要对卫生专业人员进行无麸质饮食培训根据巴斯克大学 (UPV/EHU) 的一项研究，互联网是大多数乳糜泻患者在解决饮食问题时的首选来源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Study-highlights-the-need-to-train-health-professionals-on-gluten-free-diet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Study-highlights-the-need-to-train-health-professionals-on-gluten-free-diet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea070078-ed6a-4f68-9e2d-0b156ac5a595 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 13:53:00 -0400 Study highlights the need to train health professionals on gluten-free diet
增强 Treg 细胞有望预防复发性流产复发性流产可能是毁灭性的，并对女性、她们的伴侣和更广泛的社会产生重大影响，但目前有效的治疗方法很少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Boosting-Treg-cells-shows-promise-in-preventing-recurrent-pregnancy-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Boosting-Treg-cells-shows-promise-in-preventing-recurrent-pregnancy-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bec63cfa-eaf9-4b11-a829-a1c36e8c441b Tue, 29 Oct 2024 13:26:00 -0400 Boosting Treg cells shows promise in preventing recurrent pregnancy loss
患者症状信息提高 MRI 腰椎诊断的准确性根据今天发表在北美放射学会 (RSNA) 杂志《放射学》上的一项研究，了解患者的症状有助于放射科医生进行腰椎 MRI 解释和诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Patient-symptom-information-enhances-MRI-accuracy-for-lumbar-spine-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Patient-symptom-information-enhances-MRI-accuracy-for-lumbar-spine-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=689e7ec9-817d-4a20-bb1e-4f5db70df7d4 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 13:22:22 -0400 Patient symptom information enhances MRI accuracy for lumbar spine diagnosis
AI模型可以帮助临床医生了解前列腺肿瘤的侵袭性前列腺癌是男性第二大常见癌症，美国每年有近 30 万人被诊断出患有前列腺癌https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/AI-model-could-help-clinicians-to-understand-prostate-tumors-aggressiveness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/AI-model-could-help-clinicians-to-understand-prostate-tumors-aggressiveness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0f09560-a04e-48f3-9fd4-2bade926d373 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 13:17:04 -0400 AI model could help clinicians to understand prostate tumor's aggressiveness
研究发现常规眼眶斑块旋切术在心脏支架置入术中没有任何益处西奈山领导的一项研究发现，在患者接受心脏支架手术之前，常规使用眼眶斑块切除装置从严重阻塞的冠状动脉中去除钙，并不能改善结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Study-finds-no-benefit-of-routine-orbital-athertreatment-in-cardiac-stenting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Study-finds-no-benefit-of-routine-orbital-athertreatment-in-cardiac-stenting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3bdc91d-89ca-45e6-9472-c37781940b38 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 12:48:13 -0400 Study finds no benefit of routine orbital atherectomy in cardiac stenting
研究表明大型语言模型容易受到错误信息的影响研究人员揭示了医学中大型语言模型的脆弱性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Study-shows-large-language-models-susceptible-to-misinformation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Study-shows-large-language-models-susceptible-to-misinformation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c45a8bf-be12-4654-87d3-411f76a9ee13 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 12:46:00 -0400 Study shows large language models susceptible to misinformation
